content: onigiri amigurumi e-mail blog ravelry etsy materials key final piece should measure about 2 tall dk weight yarn in white black chain = chain pink single_crochet = single_crochet b hook 2 25mm increase = increase this is an icrochetthings 6 mm safety eyes decrease = decrease original pattern © 2018 do stuffing c1t = chain 1 turn not claim as your own do scissors underlined = work in the same stitch not copy sell or distribute tapestry needle f/o = finish off this pattern do not sell any x = repeat products made from this x = total number of stitches pattern © icrochetthings 2018 rice
